title: Play that Jazz!
description:
Jalen and Jacoby jump into a packed night of NBA action, starting with the Bucks remaining undefeated, and the Nets winning without Ben Simmons (Steve Nash was fired right after we finished, we'll chop that up tomorrow). But the team we really need to turn our attention toward today is the Utah Jazz, who can not stop winning. The guys go deep on why they've been so competitive, and what you can expect this season. Plus! An ugly Bengals loss, Philly winning without Embiid, and so much more. Pull up! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
